languages.text: Разведчики обнаружили множество конструкций — могильников и обелисков, принадлежавших ксенорасе, некогда владевшей этими звездными системами. Сейчас все они скованы льдом и пребывают в торжественном погребальном покое. Следов активности потенциально враждебных чужаков не обнаружено.

The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.
languages.original_text: Разведчики обнаружили множество конструкций — могильников и обелисков, принадлежавших ксенорасе, некогда владевшей этими звездными системами. Сейчас все они скованы льдом и пребывают в торжественном погребальном покое. Следов активности потенциально враждебных чужаков не обнаружено.

traits.locale_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

languages.text: 侦察兵发现了许多座建筑，那些建筑是异形的墓地与方尖碑，曾属于这些星系原本的主人。如今，这些建筑都被覆盖在冰雪之中，一片肃穆。侦察队并没有发现潜在敌对异形的活动迹象。
languages.original_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

traits.locale_text: 侦察兵发现了许多座建筑，那些建筑是异形的墓地与方尖碑，曾属于这些星系原本的主人。如今，这些建筑都被覆盖在冰雪之中，一片肃穆。侦察队并没有发现潜在敌对异形的活动迹象。

languages.text: 偵察部隊は巨体な構造物を発見する。かつてこの星系を支配していた異種族の墓地とオベリスクだ。今はそのどれもが、厳粛で不気味な静けさと氷に覆われている。敵意を持ちうる異種族が活動している形跡は見当たらない。
languages.original_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

traits.locale_text: 偵察部隊は巨体な構造物を発見する。かつてこの星系を支配していた異種族の墓地とオベリスクだ。今はそのどれもが、厳粛で不気味な静けさと氷に覆われている。敵意を持ちうる異種族が活動している形跡は見当たらない。

languages.text: Los exploradores descubren numerosas estructuras: necrópolis y obeliscos de la raza xenos que antaño gobernó estos sistemas estelares, ahora envueltos en hielo y una solemne quietud sepulcral. No se han detectado signos de actividad xenos potencialmente hostil.
languages.original_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores descubren numerosas estructuras: necrópolis y obeliscos de la raza xenos que antaño gobernó estos sistemas estelares, ahora envueltos en hielo y una solemne quietud sepulcral. No se han detectado signos de actividad xenos potencialmente hostil.

languages.text: Les éclaireurs découvrent dans la glace de nombreuses structures érigées par l'espace xénos qui régnait autrefois sur ces systèmes stellaires. Il se dégage de ces cimetières et obélisques une solennité sépulcrale dépourvue de tout signe d'activité xénos potentiellement hostile.
languages.original_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

traits.locale_text: Les éclaireurs découvrent dans la glace de nombreuses structures érigées par l'espace xénos qui régnait autrefois sur ces systèmes stellaires. Il se dégage de ces cimetières et obélisques une solennité sépulcrale dépourvue de tout signe d'activité xénos potentiellement hostile.

languages.text: Die Späher entdecken zahlreiche Strukturen – Begräbnisstätten und Obelisken des Xenovolks, das diese Sonnensysteme einst beherrscht hat – nun allesamt in Eis und Totenstille eingeschlossen. Zeichen von potenziell feindseligen Xenoaktivitäten wurden nicht gefunden.
languages.original_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

traits.locale_text: Die Späher entdecken zahlreiche Strukturen – Begräbnisstätten und Obelisken des Xenovolks, das diese Sonnensysteme einst beherrscht hat – nun allesamt in Eis und Totenstille eingeschlossen. Zeichen von potenziell feindseligen Xenoaktivitäten wurden nicht gefunden.

languages.text: Keşif erler; birçok yapı keşfediyor, bir zamanlar bu yıldız sistemlerini yöneten zeno ırkına ait mezarlık ve dikili taşlar buluyorlar. Hepsi buza dönmüş, ciddiyet ve sessizlik içinde beklemekte. Burada olası bir düşman zeno hareketliliğine rastlanmadı.
languages.original_text: The scouts discover numerous structures — burial grounds and obelisks of the xenorace that once ruled these star systems — all of which are now encased in ice and solemn sepulchral stillness. No signs of activity by potentially hostile xenos have been detected.

traits.locale_text: Keşif erleri, birçok yapı keşfettiler. Bir zamanlar bu yıldız sistemlerini yöneten zeno ırkına ait mezarlıklar ve dikili taşlar buldular. Hepsi artık buz ve resmî ama içi boş bir durgunluk içinde sıkışıp kalmıştı. Potansiyel düşman zeno aktivitesi izine rastlanmadı.
